divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking down Yorktown east of Beach blvd when I looked up and noticed an orb or sphere shaped object at about 25 thousand feet and about 2 miles off the coast traveling at maybe 300 mph when it stoped in mid flight then continued on then you could tell it went into a deep exceleration stright up out of sight.I know aircraft as many fly in pateren on approach and take off from both Orange County airport and Long Beach airport. This was not a fixed winged aircraft for sure.
Summary: White sphere against a clear blue morning sky.
trends: There have been 49 other sightings in Huntington Beach
There were no other sightings in Huntington Beach on or around July 17th 2010
